content: nisselue by skeindeer knits a simple scandinavian nisselue from me to all of you wishing you happy holidays knit in the round using rib and stockinette only this is my gift to all of you as thanks for your tremendous support as i am dipping my toes into knitwear designs i hope you will enjoy this pattern and if you need any help or have any suggestions please do not hesitate to contact me on ravelry the group skeindeer knits is the best place for support happy knitting © skeindeer knits 1 yarn 525 metres 574 yards fingering weight yarn i used 3 x 50g 175m skeins sandnes sisu yarn alternatives rauma finullgarn per tyvring pt2 sandnes tove drops baby merino navia duo or any fingering weight yarn of your choice sizes small 54cm medium 57cm & large 61cm gauge small 28 sts per 10cm/4 medium 26 sts per 10m/4 large 24 sts per 10cm/4 needle gauge size & ¼ below gauge size 40 cm/16 circular needles gauge size 80cm/32 + circulars or dpns swatch with needle sizes ranging between 2 5- 4mm/us 00-2 ½ depending on head circumference to see if you knit to gauge or whether you need to go up or down a needle size your required needle size may be outside this range if you have too many stitches per 10cm/4 go up a size and vice versa as a very tight knitter i use needle size 3 75mm/ us 5 to achieve a gauge of 24 sts per 10cm 3 5/ us 4 for 26 sts and 3 25/ us 3 for 28 sts abbreviations - st/sts stitch/stitches - k knit - p purl - pm place stitch marker - k2tog knit 2 sts together the ribbed hem magic_ring cast on 144 sts on ¼ below gauge size needles and join in the round round 1 *k2 p2* repeat *-* until the end of round repeat round 1 for 10cm/4 the head change to gauge size needles and k 20cm/8 stockinette 30cm/12 if you count the rib place 4 stitch markers evenly *pm k36* repeat *-* until end of round the tail **decrease round *k all until 2 sts before stitch marker k2tog* repeat *-* until end of round k all for 6 rounds** repeat **-** until you have 12 sts left break yarn and pull through the stitches and secure on the inside © skeindeer knits 2
